capabilities.name: list_projects
capabilities.description: List all projects in the memory bank

capabilities.name: list_project_files
capabilities.description: List all files within a specific project

capabilities.name: memory_bank_read
capabilities.description: Read a memory bank file for a specific project

capabilities.name: memory_bank_write
capabilities.description: Create a new memory bank file for a specific project

capabilities.name: memory_bank_update
capabilities.description: Update an existing memory bank file for a specific project
